name: Garlic Brussels Sprouts with Crispy Bacon
author: smokey14903
summary: Pan-fry Brussels sprouts in butter and crispy bacon for a smoky addition to your vegetable side dish. You can add a little of the bacon grease to the dish if you prefer.
directions: Cut an 'X' in the core end of each Brussels sprout
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes; drain and cool on paper towels
Heat 1 teaspoon butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir garlic until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes
Add Brussels sprouts; toss to coat
Stir in broth, salt, and black pepper; cover and cook until Brussels sprouts are tender, 12 to 14 minutes
Stir remaining 2 teaspoons butter into Brussels sprouts mixture until melted
